tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Yes , Dr. Sathish friendly approach...and explain the problem and give the solutions....now i feel better....pathlab staff unnecessary argue with me...I never get my operation CD...i ask the CD... even Mr. Dr.sathish also told him.,but he never listen it...we already given , already given like that argue.... Lastly he given.... suppose CD given is regular prossess ? But when I discharged me....no body  not given CD.
This is not complaint...just inform....some staff are not service minded.hindi speaking students are not polait approach... Overall I given to hospital 80markes out of 100...thank you.
